Project1.title: Star Destroyer

Project2.title: Dark Knight
Project2.description: A Dark Knight themed messaging app. This project demonstrates the authors' fluency in the use of Webpack, modules, SASS, Bootstrap, vanilla JavaScript, jQuery and HTML.
Project2.technologiesUsed: SASS, Bootstrap, vanilla JavaScript, jQuery and HTML.

Project3.title: Sorting Hat
Project3.description: Allows you to sort students into one of the harry potter houses.
Project3.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, Vanilla JavaScript, Bootsrap, Version Control with Github
